commit message: get rid of +0 in the history view; it's just confusing
set first entry in history to be bold until it's no longer editable, for more visibility into auto-updating
added 'Confirm' and 'Undo Last' options when long-pressing on history
fix bug where background runnables kept running after starting a new game with the same settings
fix bug where background threads were getting canceled at the wrong time
make sure to save if the user just removes the last history entry
